string.name: name
string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Ocean
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the ocean?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then from #bOrbis Tower#k all the way down to #bAqua Road#k? I think she told me to take the #bDolphin Taxi#k at Aquarium...

Okay, now I'll tell you how to get to Korean Folk Town underwater. First, head over to the station in #bEllinia#k. The ship that heads to #bOrbis#k should leave every 15 minutes. Once at Orbis, head over to #bOrbis Tower#k and make your way all the way down to the 1st floor, which should be right at the ground level.

You can enter #bAqua Road#k through the #bbasement of Orbis Tower#k. Navigate your way through Aqua Road and you'll find #bAquarium#k, a town that is completely underwater. Once there, you'll find #bDolphin Taxi#k, which should take you to the nearest spot from the Korean Folk Town.
Talk to me once more, so I can give you all the necessary items for the travel.
Please let me know when you're ready.
This ticket will enable you to get on board for the flight. Please use it wisely.
